metadata.title: [bocal]
metadata.headline: Things to read later and feeds in one place
metadata.description: The content you care is scattered around the internet. Bring together your RSS feeds, reading lists and other web sources in one easy-to-browse place.
metadata.lastCtaDescription: One place to keep and follow everything, it's that simple ðŸª„

features.title: Save content to read
features.description: Keep any link for later in an organized space. Sort and archive easily to find your content when you need it.

features.title: Follow your favorite sources
features.description: Blogs, YouTube, Reddit... Stay updated with all your favorite content through RSS and Atom feeds.

features.title: Centralize your newsletters
features.description: Free or paid, keep all your newsletters in the same place as your other content.

metadata.footerShortDescription: [bocal] â€” all your content in one place.

errors.unexpected: An error happened. Please try again.

404.title: 404 - Page not found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

errors.unexpected: An error happened. Please try again.

info.textFeedsCount: {count, plural, =0 {no feeds yet} =1 {one feed} other {# feeds}}
info.textUnreachableCount: {count, plural, =0 {all feeds reachable} =1 {one unreachable} other {# unreachable}}
info.title: Feeds

errors.unexpected: An error happened. Please try again.

newsletter.description: Follow your newsletters as a feed.
newsletter.descFeedUrl: Feed URL to follow the newsletter. Automatically added to Feeds section.
newsletter.descUsermail: Subscribe to a newsletter with this email.

deleteNewsletterContextMenu.title: Are you sure you want to delete this newsletter? All entries will be removed.
deleteNewsletterContextMenu.desc: We recommend unsubscribing before deleting this newsletter.

explanation.title: How it works
explanation.part1: Use the provided email address to subscribe to newsletters.
explanation.part2: Do not share this address with third parties: anyone with access to it will be able to send you emails.
explanation.part3: If the newsletter you subscribe to sends a confirmation email, it will appear as a new entry in the newsletter feed.

hide.title: Hide read content
hide.description: Hide read content from the feeds timeline.

feed.title: Feeds items limit
feed.description: Set the maximum number of items to show on the feeds page.

deleteAccountSection.title: Delete account!
deleteAccountSection.description: Delete your account here. This is irreversible.
